verses.verse: Now the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> had a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6099>great<s%> <S%H7227>multitude<s%> of <S%H4735>livestock:<s%> and when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3270>Jazer,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> that <S%H4725>behold,<s%> the place was a <S%H4725>place<s%> for <S%H4735>livestock;<s%>

the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and to the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5852>"Ataroth,<s%> and <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> and <S%H3270>Jazer,<s%> and <S%H5247>Nimrah,<s%> and <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H500>Elealeh,<s%> and <S%H7643>Sebam,<s%> and <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> and <S%H1194>Beon,<s%>

the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> is a <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H4735>livestock;<s%> and your <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H4735>livestock.<s%>"

They <S%H559>said,<s%> "If we have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> let this <S%H776>land<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants<s%> for a <S%H272>possession;<s%> <S%H5674>don't<s%> bring us over the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> "Shall your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H4421>war,<s%> and shall you sit <S%H3427>here?<s%>

Why do <S%H5106>you<s%> discourage the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from going <S%H5674>over<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has given <S%H5414>them?<s%>
Your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so when I <S%H7971>sent<s%> them from <S%H6947>Kadesh<s%> Barnea to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

For when they went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> they <S%H5106>discouraged<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they should not <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had given <S%H5414>them.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and he <S%H7650>swore,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H518><s%> 'Surely none of the <S%H582>men<s%> who came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> because they have not <S%H4390>wholly<s%> followed <S%H310>me:<s%>

except <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenizzite,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun;<s%> because they have <S%H310>followed<s%> Yahweh <S%H3068>completely.<s%>'

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he made them <S%H5128>wander<s%> back and forth in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> until all the <S%H1755>generation,<s%> who had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> was <S%H8552>consumed.<s%>

<S%H6965>"Behold,<s%> you have risen up in your <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H8635>place,<s%> an increase of <S%H2400>sinful<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> to <S%H5595>augment<s%> yet the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> toward <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For if you turn <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3254>him,<s%> he will yet again <S%H3240>leave<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and you will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> all this <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

They came <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, "We will <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1448>sheepfolds<s%> here for our <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> and <S%H5892>cities<s%> for our little <S%H2945>ones:<s%>

but we <S%H587>ourselves<s%> will be <S%H2363>ready<s%> <S%H2502>armed<s%> to go <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> until we have <S%H935>brought<s%> them to their <S%H4725>place:<s%> and our little <S%H2945>ones<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>
We will not <S%H7725>return<s%> to our <S%H1004>houses,<s%> until the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H5157>inherited<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

For we will not <S%H5157>inherit<s%> with them on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H1973>forward;<s%> because our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> is <S%H935>fallen<s%> to us on this <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>eastward.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6213>them,<s%> "If you will do this <S%H1697>thing,<s%> if you will <S%H2502>arm<s%> yourselves to go <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to the <S%H4421>war,<s%>

and every <S%H2502>armed<s%> man of you will <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> until he has driven <S%H3423>out<s%> his <S%H341>enemies<s%> from before <S%H6440>him,<s%>

and the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> then <S%H310>afterward<s%> you shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and be <S%H5355>guiltless<s%> towards <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and towards <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and this <S%H776>land<s%> shall be to you for a <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
"But if you will not do <S%H6213>so,<s%> <S%H2398>behold,<s%> you have sinned against <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and be <S%H3045>sure<s%> your <S%H2403>sin<s%> will find you <S%H4672>out.<s%>

<S%H1129>Build<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for your little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and <S%H1448>folds<s%> for your <S%H6792>sheep;<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which has <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>"

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> as my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H6680>commands.<s%>
Our little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> our <S%H802>wives,<s%> our <S%H4735>flocks,<s%> and all our <S%H929>livestock,<s%> shall be there in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead;<s%>

but your <S%H5650>servants<s%> will pass <S%H5674>over,<s%> every man who is <S%H2502>armed<s%> for <S%H6635>war,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> as my <S%H3068>lord<s%> <S%H1696>says.<s%>"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> concerning them to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and to the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>them,<s%> "If the children of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> will pass with you <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> every man who is <S%H2502>armed<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5414>you;<s%> then you shall give them the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> for a <S%H272>possession:<s%>
but if they will not pass <S%H5674>over<s%> with you <S%H2502>armed,<s%> they shall have <S%H270>possessions<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>"

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>said<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> so will we <S%H6213>do.<s%>

We <S%H5168>will<s%> pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2502>armed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and the <S%H272>possession<s%> of our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> shall remain with us <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H1121>them,<s%> even to the children of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> - <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> according to its <S%H5892>cities<s%> and <S%H1367>borders,<s%> even the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5439>surrounding<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> and <S%H5852>Ataroth,<s%> and <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%>
and <S%H5855>Atrothshophan,<s%> and <S%H3270>Jazer,<s%> and <S%H3011>Jogbehah,<s%>
and Beth <S%H1039>Nimrah,<s%> and Beth <S%H1028>Haran:<s%> <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H1448>folds<s%> for <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H500>Elealeh,<s%> and <S%H7156>Kiriathaim,<s%>

and <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> and Baal <S%H1186>Meon,<s%> (their <S%H8034>names<s%> being <S%H4142>changed<s%>), and <S%H7643>Sibmah:<s%> and they <S%H7121>gave<s%> other <S%H8034>names<s%> to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which they <S%H1129>built.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H3423>it,<s%> and dispossessed the Amorites who were <S%H567>therein.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> to <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh;<s%> and he lived <S%H3427>therein.<s%>
<S%H2971>Jair<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> its <S%H2333>towns,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> them Havvoth <S%H2334>Jair.<s%>
<S%H5025>Nobah<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H7079>Kenath,<s%> and its <S%H1323>villages,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H5025>Nobah,<s%> after his own <S%H8034>name.<s%>
